rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Reception Area
rooms.description: Features an inviting entrance hall with a reception area, incorporating traditional Chettinad motifs and Vastu principles to welcome positive energy. The space is used for greeting guests and transitioning into the farmhouse.

rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.description: An expansive open-plan living-dining area with ample natural light from large windows facing east for optimal Vastu alignment. The decor includes handcrafted wood elements and intricate stone patterns typical of Chettinad style.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated multimedia room with acoustic panels, ambient lighting, and state-of-the-art AV systems. Positioned on the south side to ensure soundproofing and energy flow as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Kitchen & Utility
rooms.description: A fully equipped modern kitchen with traditional Chettinad touches such as terracotta tiles and intricate woodwork. Includes a small utility area for dishwashing and food prep, designed keeping in mind the flow of energy.

rooms.name: Guest Quarters
rooms.description: A self-contained guest suite that includes a bedroom, private bathroom, and sitting area. Designed following Vastu principles to ensure a restful ambiance for visitors.

openings.description: A wide, welcoming entrance featuring traditional Chettinad design elements and a large archway. Emphasizes an inviting energy flow as per Vastu.
Large windows designed for natural lighting and to enhance the energy of the living room and dining area, aligned with Vastu guidelines.
Strategically placed windows ensuring cross ventilation in the kitchen and utility areas.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: An expansive suite featuring a king-sized bed, walk-in closet, attached bathroom with luxury fittings, and an adjoining balcony. Designed to ensure privacy and calm energy as per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A comfortable bedroom with ample storage space and a private balcony facing the north, aligned for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: A versatile room that can serve as an additional sleeping area or study. Designed in keeping with Chettinad aesthetics and Vastu-aligned spatial orientation.

openings.description: A well-designed staircase that connects the ground floor to the first floor, ensuring ease of access while maintaining privacy and energy flow.
An open balcony space providing fresh air and a view of the surrounding landscape, aligned with Vastu principles for relaxation and contemplation.

rooms.name: Servants Quarters
rooms.description: A self-contained living space for the servants, including a small kitchenette and bathroom. Designed to be functional and respectful of privacy while adhering to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Service Lobby
rooms.description: A dedicated area connecting the servant's quarters with the main building, ensuring smooth movement and maintenance access.

openings.description: A discreet staircase providing secure and efficient access between the first and second floors for service personnel.
An auxiliary entrance ensuring ease of movement for staff, designed with functional aesthetics that complement the farmhouse style.
